name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-msgext-search-auth-config-python
title: Search Auth Config In Messaging Extension
shortDescription: This sample demonstrates how to create a Python-based search Messaging Extension in Microsoft Teams that includes a configuration page and supports user authentication.
longDescription: This Python sample builds upon the search-based Messaging Extension to include a configuration page for user settings and authentication. It showcases how to securely sign in and manage user interactions while leveraging the Microsoft Graph API.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing search auth config in messaging extension

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
